name: Admiral Pellaeon
Lore: 'Corellian leader. Lied about his age to enter the Academy. Took command of Chimaera when its captain was killed at the Battle of Endor. Admires Grand Admiral Thrawn.',
Text: 'Adds 2 to power of anything he pilots. May be reveled from hand to take Justifier into hand from reserve deck; reshuffle and deploy both simultaneously (for -1 force each). Opponent''s passengers here are forfeit = 0. Once per game, if aboard Justifier may lose one force to move away from battle as a react (at hyperspeed +2).',
